T = int(raw_input())
while T > 0:
    T -= 1

    s = int(raw_input())
    a = map(int,raw_input().split())
    d = map(int,raw_input().split())

    p = 0
    q = 0

    while 1:

        if len(a) > 0:

            moa = min(a)
            mod = min(d)

            if moa < mod:
                p += 1
                a.remove(moa)

            elif mod < moa:
                p -= 1
                d.remove(mod)

            else:
                a.remove(moa)
                d.remove(mod)

            if p > q:
                q = p


        else:
            break

    print q
